channel.title: Music Video w/ Autodesk Maya + Adobe After Effects
channel.description:
I'm working on a million-dollar record's music video. It needs to be production value, master CGI. Movie production value, like Ironman, 300, Watchmen, Avatar, Transformers quality.
I need to learn how to take pictures of real objects and turn it into a mesh to edit in Maya, then import into AFX. Anyone have experience. The screenplay and lyrics have already been written, the song has already been produced in a studio in Hollywood by people that made music for all the top artists.
P.S. I have Kanye West's number. :|

item.title: Music Video w/ Autodesk Maya + Adobe After Effects
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Since when was CGI ever required for a music video, I’ve never seen it… Whoever asked you to do this is probably just taking the piss of out of you, that or you’re a terrible troll.

Read full topic
